description: This file defines the routing logic for a Flutter application, including the main router configuration, a route parser converting URLs to route names, and a custom router delegate managing navigation state and page rendering.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides a centralized configuration for app routing using the Router API, with static router setup.

classes.name: _SimpleRouteParser
classes.description: Parses URL paths into simple route strings and restores URLs from route strings.

classes.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages navigation state, handles route changes, and builds pages based on current route.

methods.name: AppRouter.router
methods.description: Static final router configuration object based on RouterConfig.

methods.name: _SimpleRouteParser.parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts a RouteInformation object into a route string; defaults '/' to '/dashboard'.

methods.name: _SimpleRouteParser.restoreRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts a route string into a RouteInformation object.

methods.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate.setNewPath
methods.description: Updates the current route path and notifies listeners.

methods.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate.setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Asynchronously sets a new route configuration.

methods.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate.build
methods.description: Builds the Navigator widget with pages based on current path.

methods.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate._buildBody
methods.description: Returns the widget corresponding to the current route path.
